synopsis.text: Makishima's and Toudou's cycling tales unfold in this two-part anime adaptation of the Yowamushi Pedal spin-off manga. In the first part, we follow Makishima Yuusuke, a first-year student with an unconventional dancing style, as he joins the Sohoku bicycle racing club. Despite facing initial disapproval from his seniors, he becomes a central figure in the team. The second part focuses on Toudou Jinpachi, who first discovered his passion for road racing in his second year of middle school. Initially hesitant to race due to his fear of helmet hair, Toudou eventually becomes an integral member of his team. These interconnected stories reveal the pasts of these dedicated cyclists and the challenges they faced on their journey to becoming the backbones of their respective teams.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
